title: K-pop star Sulli is found dead at her home aged 25
text:
A K-pop star has been found dead at her home close to Seoul, South Korea just a month after suspending her music career while struggling with social media abuse.

Sulli, 25, whose real name is Choi Jin-ri, was found by her manager at her home in Seongnam, south of the capital, Seoul at around 3.20pm local time (7.20am UK time).

Korean police said that they are working on the assumption that she may have committed suicide.

Sulli, 25, whose real name is Choi Jin-ri (pictured), was found by her manager at her home in Seongnam, south of the capital, Seoul at around 3.20pm local time

South Korean pop star and actress Sulli poses during the K-Beauty Close-Up event in Seoul, South Korea. Police say that Sulli suffered from depression and had spoken out against cyber-bullying in the past

Seoul police said in a statement that her manager had tried to call round to the 25-year-old's house last night but received no response.

They added that the K-pop star was battling severe depression and had spoken out against cyber-bullying in the past.

Sulli is said to have suspended her music career after struggling with abuse she received online over recent months, according to the BBC.

Sulli of f(x) poses for photographs during the DECKE flagship store opening event on March 20, 2014 in Seoul, South Korea (left). She can be seen posing at the Drama Awards at SBS Prism Tower on December 31, 2012 in Seoul, South Korea (right). The K-pop singer had over five million followers on Instagram and was first involved in scandal in 2016 after she revealed her nipples online. This caused uproar in the traditionally conservative South Korea

The 25-year-old had over five million followers on Instagram and was first involved in scandal in 2016 after showing her nipples online. This caused uproar in the traditionally conservative South Korea.

The 'no bra' scandal resurfaced last month when her breasts were shown accidentally during a live Instagram stream.

Sulli had been a member of the popular K-pop band F(x) but left in 2015 to focus on her acting and solo singing career.
description: K-pop star, Sulli, 25 has been found dead at her home near Seoul, Korea. Police say they are working on the assumption that she took her own life a month after she received torrents of online abuse.
